articles.description: With OnePlus confirming that it will introduce the OnePlus Pad Pro in China, this would mark the company’s first tablet release in its home turf.
articles.content: OnePlus has announced on Weibo that the OnePlus Ace 3 Pro will be officially launched in China on June 27. The company will also launch the OnePlus Pad Pro, OnePlus Buds 3 and new OnePlus Watch 2. Se… [+2258 chars]
